description: Try our easy to follow Seafood Pasta With Lemon Crumbs recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Seafood pasta,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Prawn,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Lemon,Seafood,Low sugar,Sesame free,High protein,Soy free,Wheat free,Tomato,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Seafood Pasta With Lemon Crumbs Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs olive oil (plus extra to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat 1 tbs oil in a frying pan over medium heat. Add breadcrumbs and toast, stirring occasionally, until golden. Stir in garlic and cook for 1 minute or until fragrant. Transfer to a bowl and stir in zest.
Cut along both sides of the squid. Pat dry with paper towel. Slice into very thin strips. Chop prawns. Place squid and prawn in a second bowl with remaining oil and season with pepper. Set aside.
Cook pasta following packet directions until tender. Drain and keep warm.
Meanwhile, heat frying pan over high heat. Add squid and prawn and cook, tossing often, for 2-3 minutes or until they change colour. Add tomato and warm through for 1 minute.
Add pasta, rocket and lemon juice to pan. Stir through to combine.
Divide between serving bowls, drizzle with extra oil and top with crumb mixture. Serve.
